page.title: 07ECOLOGY
page.content: {Animals}_ Wildlife abounds. Foxes,badgers, hares,rabbits,grey squirrels,small mammals,hedgehogs,etc. Many bats. Stoats,weasels, mink.Possibly still otters. {Birds}_ Buzzard,sparrowhawk,kestrel. Woodland birds. Gulls. Shag,cormorant. Estuary provides shelter for wintering sea_ducks,grebes,divers. Waders on mud.Missing woodland birds from area include wood warbler, nightingale,tree pipit,etc.No dippers this far S.W. {Trees}_ mixed deciduous woodland.Some pine. Many elms lost to Dutch elm disease. {Climate}_ temperate. Maritime prevailing wind is S.W. Very little frost and snow.Sea mists common. {Pollution}_ no air pollution,very little river pollution,some oil etc. in sea.Some silting.
